title: Software Engineer
description: I architected a scalable system for rapid deployment, making key decisions in UHBVN (Uttar Haryana Bijli Vibhag Nigam) infrastructure, database management, and design paradigms. Worked in  team of 3 in developing backend services for web and mobile using REST APIs and component-based software engineering. Collaborated with frontend engineers for seamless integration, implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for automated build, test, and deployment processes.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: At RadicalX, I contributed to advancing ReX, our AI Coach, utilizing innovative technologies for personalized career guidance and mentorship.

title: Product Intern
description: Designed and developed web system that streamlines inventory management process for internal employees. Collaborated with other engineers on existing internal systems to add new features and fix bugs.
